price: Ka ce: "Yã ku mutãnena! Ku yi aiki a kan halinku, lalle ne nĩ mai aiki ne, sa'an nan da sannu zã ku san wanda ãƙibar gida zã ta kasance a gare shi. Lalle ne shi, azzãlumai bã zã su ci nasarã ba."
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡمَلُواْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمۡ إِنِّي عَامِلٞۖ فَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ مَن تَكُونُ لَهُۥ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلدَّارِۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul yāqawmi iʿ'malū ʿalā makānatikum innī ʿāmilun fasawfa taʿlamūna man takūnu lahu ʿāqibatu al-dāri innahu lā yuf'liḥu al-ẓālimūna
